name: Treasure Hunters (itch) (Tanicorn, JeMappellePelle, Scobmyster, Wandering_Owl)
description:
Discover artefacts before your rivals! Explore the wilderness, cut a path through obstacles and use your abilities and traps to get to the treasure before the other players. Make sure to bring them back to the temple in the centre in order to earn points!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team Goldrush is:

Me - Tanicorn(Designer/Programmer)

Joseph Scobbie - Scobmyster (Programmer)

Elspeth Nicol - Wandering Owl (Artist)

Joseph Bardolph - JeMappellePelle (Artist)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Controls:

    Move: WASD

    Use machete: Space

    Pick up/stash treasure: E

    Steal item: F

    Use abilities: Click icons

    HowToPlay:

    Join or Host a match, play with at least two player and press join to ready up. 

    Play with friends or play with random people!

    Find artefacts around the map by cutting down the flora. Stash your artefacts in the temple to gain points. First to reach 10000 points or whoever has the most score by the end of the timer wins.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the #GamesInnovationChallenge in 5 weeks

When browsing or creating lobbies, it may take a few seconds to load into the next screen.

Do be aware that once you go into a lobby you cannot exit without having to restart the game. But then again, why would you ever want to leave?
